name: Glass White
description2: This premium glass features a sleek and modern white finish, perfect for home decor or office settings. It’s durable, stylish, and adds a touch of elegance to any room.

name: Gradient Beats
description: Gradient Beats headphones with superior sound quality.
description2: Experience music like never before with the Gradient Beats headphones. Featuring cutting-edge sound technology, they deliver deep bass and crystal-clear audio in a unique gradient design.

name: Hard Contrast Laptop
description: Sleek, high-performance laptop with hard contrast design.
description2: This laptop offers powerful performance with a stylish hard contrast design. Ideal for professionals and students alike, it features a high-resolution display and fast processing speeds.

name: Hoodie
description2: This hoodie is made from soft, breathable fabric, ensuring both comfort and style. Perfect for everyday wear or lounging at home.

name: Pink Hoodie
description: Trendy pink hoodie with soft fabric.
description2: A trendy, lightweight hoodie in pink, made from soft and durable fabric. Stay cozy while looking stylish in this must-have wardrobe item.

name: Liquids
description2: This eye-catching abstract liquid design adds a modern and artistic vibe to any space. Its bright colors and flowing design make it a focal point in any room.

name: Perfume Magic
description2: A magical blend of enchanting aromas, Perfume Magic is perfect for those special occasions when you want to make a lasting impression.

name: Pink Beats
description2: The Pink Beats headphones combine iconic sound quality with a stylish design. Whether you’re working out or relaxing, these headphones offer a perfect listening experience.

name: Premium Perfume
description: Top-tier premium fragrance for special occasions.
description2: This premium perfume is crafted for those who seek a luxurious, long-lasting fragrance. Perfect for evening wear, its sophisticated aroma lingers throughout the day.

name: Red Laptop
description: Elegant red laptop for all your computing needs.
description2: This high-performance laptop stands out with its elegant red design. Packed with powerful features, it’s the ideal choice for both professional and personal use.

name: Row Hoodie
description: Soft and cozy hoodie for daily wear.
description2: This cozy hoodie is perfect for everyday wear, offering a combination of warmth and comfort. Its casual design makes it a great choice for all occasions.

name: Shirts Pack
description2: Get the best value with this pack of 2 high-quality shirts. Crafted for comfort and style, they are ideal for casual or semi-formal settings.

name: Casual Shirt
description: Stylish casual shirt for everyday wear.
description2: This casual shirt is perfect for everyday wear, offering a stylish and comfortable fit. It’s a versatile piece that pairs well with any outfit.

name: Bright Laptop
description: Bright and powerful laptop for multitasking.
description2: Designed for those who need a bright and responsive laptop, this device offers outstanding multitasking performance, making it ideal for both work and play.

name: Smile Hoodie
description: Happy hoodie with smiley face design.
description2: Spread positive vibes with the Smile Hoodie. Made from soft fabric, its unique smiley face design is sure to brighten up your day and everyone around you.

name: Beats 2
description: Second edition of Beats headphones with superior audio.
description2: The Beats 2 headphones deliver premium sound quality with enhanced features for a superior listening experience. Their comfortable fit makes them perfect for long hours of use.

name: White Beats
description2: These classic white Beats headphones are designed for sound lovers. With exceptional audio performance and a timeless look, they are perfect for any music enthusiast.

name: Blue and Black Shoes
description2: Step out in comfort with these blue and black shoes, crafted from high-quality materials. Ideal for both casual wear and light exercise.

name: Glass Black
description2: This black glass design exudes sophistication with its sleek finish. Perfect for modern spaces, it's both functional and decorative.
